import * as React from 'react' import './css/App.css' import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css' import {Link, Outlet, useLocation} from 'react-router-dom' import {stringify} from "querystring"; function App (): JSX.Element { const isActive = (link:string) => { return useLocation().pathname === link ? 'active' : ''; } return (
